page.title: 05WOOKEY HOLE SCHOOL
page.content: WOOKEY HOLE SCHOOL HAS BEEN RUNNING FOR OVER A CENTURY,BUT HAS NOW BECOME VERY SMALL WITH THIRTY ONE CHILDREN, WHO LIVE IN WOOKEY HOLE, EASTON AND WELLS. THE SCHOOL IS NOT VERY EASY TO SEE FROM THE VILLAGE,AS IT IS ON A HILL.IT LOOKS LIKE A CASTLE WITH CHURCH SPIRES AND ARCHED WINDOWS. INSIDE IT DOES NOT LOOK VERY OLD AS RECENTLY THE CEILING HAS BEEN LOWERED AND MODERNISED. THERE ARE STILL THE REMAINS OF AN OLD GAS LAMP BUT THERE IS NOW ELECTRIC STRIP LIGHTING,MODERN FURNITURE AND ELECTRICAL EQUIPMENT. IT IS BRIGHTLY PAINTED AND THE CHILDREN'S ATTRACTIVE WORK IS DISPLAYED ON THE WALLS. THE OLDER CHILDREN STILL CULTIVATE THEIR OWN GARDENS,GROWING VEGTABLES AND FLOWERS.
